title: Cryptocurrency Finder
description: Cryptocurrency Finder is a React-JS project which displays different crypto coins using API.

title: QR Code Generator
description: This is React JS project which generates QR code to open the website when url is entered and also it can be downloaded.

title: Quiz App
description: This is React JS project which displays various questions to gain knowledge and also displays the score.

title: To Do List
description: To do list provide all the CRUD operations to the user. Help to keep their notes on the website temporary.

title: Password Generator
description: This project is a react.js project that creates a random password.

title: Weather App
description: This project is a React-JS project using material ui, that helps to search the weather for any place, it uses api to render the information and then provided to the user.

title: Currency Converter
description: Ths is a simple currency converter application that allows users to convert between different currencies. It fetches live exchange rates from an API and performs conversions accordingly.

title: Code Editor
description: This is a code editor application built with React.js. It allows users to write, edit, and execute code snippets in programming languages like HTML,CSS,JS. The editor provides syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and other essential features to enhance the coding experience.

title: Notes App
description: This is an user-friendly notes app enabling seamless note management functionalities.

title: Movie Land
description: MovieLand is a web application that fetches and displays movies from the OMDB API, allowing users to search and explore various movie titles. It provides a simple interface to view movie details such as title, year, and poster.

title: Travel Website
description: This is a website made using reactjs to showcase the different places of the world to the tourist to go there for a tour.

title: Form Validation
description: This is a simple registration form built with React, that features real-time validation and error handling to ensure that users provide valid information

title: Functional Image Gallery
description: This project is designed to function as a gallery for displaying images fetched from the Pexels API. Users can search for images using keywords and view them in a gallery format. Additionally, the application supports a lightbox feature for larger previews of selected images.
